title: AI Governance for Policy Makers
description: A structured journey through AI constitutional oversight from the policy maker's perspective
purpose: To equip policy makers with understanding of how to participate in AI governance appeals and constitutional processes

steps.stepTitle: Policy Maker
steps.stepNarrative: AI Governance - Constitutional oversight and appeals
learningObjectives: Understand Policy Maker

steps.stepTitle: Addressing existential AI risk through democratic governance
steps.stepNarrative: superintelligent AI poses existential threat; democratic oversight might mitigate this risk; I participate in global existential risk discussions... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Addressing existential AI risk through democratic governance

steps.stepTitle: Addressing global inequality in protocol access
steps.stepNarrative: research shows protocol adoption correlates with national wealth; poor nations lack infrastructure for implementation; I advocate for global equity in access... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Addressing global inequality in protocol access

steps.stepTitle: Addressing protocol implications for labor and employment law
steps.stepNarrative: protocol affects work and value recognition; care work generates care tokens; I update labor law for protocol economy... (9 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Addressing protocol implications for labor and employment law

steps.stepTitle: Addressing protocol-tax law integration questions
steps.stepNarrative: protocol creates novel economic relationships; tax implications are unclear; I work with revenue department on clarification... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Addressing protocol-tax law integration questions

steps.stepTitle: Advocating for protocol sovereignty in international forums
steps.stepNarrative: international organizations discuss AI regulation; some proposals would mandate centralization; I advocate for democratic governance principles... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Advocating for protocol sovereignty in international forums

steps.stepTitle: Building international coalition resisting corporate capture
steps.stepNarrative: corporations lobby internationally for favorable regulation; they use different nations to triangulate pressure; I coordinate with international policy maker allies... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Building international coalition resisting corporate capture

steps.stepTitle: Commissioning independent research on protocol effectiveness
steps.stepNarrative: I need evidence for policy evaluation; research must be independent to be credible; I establish national research program... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Commissioning independent research on protocol effectiveness

steps.stepTitle: Coordinating interstate recognition of protocol decisions
steps.stepNarrative: protocol operates across state boundaries; consistency is needed for coordination; I work on interstate compact for protocol recognition... (9 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Coordinating interstate recognition of protocol decisions

steps.stepTitle: Coordinating response to authoritarian threats to protocol
steps.stepNarrative: authoritarian regimes may attack protocol infrastructure; democratic nations must respond collectively; I participate in democratic coalition... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Coordinating response to authoritarian threats to protocol

steps.stepTitle: Coordinating with international counterparts on AI governance
steps.stepNarrative: AI governance is global challenge; national policies affect each other; I work with international policy makers... (9 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Coordinating with international counterparts on AI governance

steps.stepTitle: Crafting enabling legislation protecting protocol sovereignty
steps.stepNarrative: I want to support democratic AI governance; I must integrate protocol with existing state law; I draft AI governance legislation... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Crafting enabling legislation protecting protocol sovereignty

steps.stepTitle: Crafting legislation enabling global constitutional amendments
steps.stepNarrative: Global Convention passed ecological standing amendment; national law must operationalize this; I translate constitutional evolution into legislation... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Crafting legislation enabling global constitutional amendments

steps.stepTitle: Creating Digital Constitutional Rights Amendment
steps.stepNarrative: protocol creates new forms of governance and rights; constitutional recognition would strengthen legitimacy; I propose national constitutional amendment... (10 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Creating Digital Constitutional Rights Amendment

steps.stepTitle: Creating national crisis reserve funds for protocol resilience
steps.stepNarrative: crises may threaten protocol infrastructure; rapid response funding is needed; I establish emergency reserves... (9 steps total)
learningObjectives: Understand Creating national crisis reserve funds for protocol resilience
